pr_title: forget password flow change and bug fixes for Android

timeline.message:
1.Flow change in Forget and then change password scenario(Force logout after changing password)
2.Splash screen getting stuck issue fixes
3.Issue in charts for month type not displaying fixes
4.Issue in handling status for studies fixes
5.Removed google.com link from App site, terms & conditions
6.Github -- simplifing filter option for studylist fixes
7.Github -- removing overlay in thumbnails for studylist fixes

timeline.bodyText:
can you please replace that with a variable instead? similar to what you have for app_name?
Feel free to leave the value of the website variable empty.
timeline.author: zohrehj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -6,15 +6,15 @@
 <resources>
     <string name="app_name">&app_name;</string>
     <string name="poweredby">Powered by FDA MyStudies on Google Cloud</string>
-    <string name="website">https://www.google.com/</string>

replies.bodyText: website string is being used only once, do we have to still create variable for it?
replies.author: naveenr-btc

timeline.bodyText: similarly these can be terms_url and privacy_url variables.
timeline.author: zohrehj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -6,15 +6,15 @@
 <resources>
     <string name="app_name">&app_name;</string>
     <string name="poweredby">Powered by FDA MyStudies on Google Cloud</string>
-    <string name="website">https://www.google.com/</string>
+    <string name="website"></string>
     <string name="websitetxt">App Website</string>
     <string name="gateway_des"><Introductory content paragraph goes here></string>
     <string name="gateway_des1"><Introductory content paragraph goes here></string>
     <string name="delete_account_content">You have chosen to delete your FDA MyStudies Account. This will result in automatic withdrawal from all studies.\n\nBelow is a list of studies that you are a part of and information on how your response data will be handled with each after you withdraw. Please review and confirm.</string>
     <string name="delete_message">Are you sure you wish to permanently delete your FDA MyStudies Gateway app account?  You will need to register again if you wish to join a study.</string>
     <string name="studie_your_enrolled">It\'s been a while since you visited the App Name app. Please consider continuing your participation in any studies in which you\'re enrolled.</string>
-    <string name="termsurl">https://www.google.com/</string>

replies.bodyText: similarly we are using these URLs only once, do we still have to create variables for these?
replies.author: naveenr-btc

timeline.bodyText: this doesn't look like a well defined failure case, what is the status code in this case? is it possible to check for that instead?
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: For this service(Study_info), we need to perform this block for all the error status code so we'll have to check in this way.
replies.author: naveenr-btc

timeline.bodyText: nit: you don't need case insensitive comparison to check for empty string. A better way to check is probably to use isBlank method. See https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/12/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/String.html#isBlank()
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: or use str.length()==0 if you do not want to exclude strings containing multiple whitespaces.
replies.author: zohrehj
